title: When is cycle 6.2 coming out for live?

replies.body: Tentative patch date's a week from now basically. That's subject to change if we discover any critical bugs in the patch during the next week of testing though.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oP157vKJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-20T03:51:41.418+0000)
>
> Tentative patch date's a week from now basically. That's subject to change if we discover any critical bugs in the patch during the next week of testing though.

Hey Meddler. Why did the troll from my first promo game immediately show up in my second promo game even though I reported it? Because matchmaking is a joke. I want to quit league and I want a refund.
you have already received a refund, its a free game.

> [{quoted}](name=ExoNautic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oP157vKJ,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-01-20T04:04:00.377+0000)
>
> you have already received a refund, its a free game.

Im definitely talking about the skins I bought.

> [{quoted}](name=MightySaturn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oP157vKJ,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-20T04:09:02.566+0000)
>
> Im definitely talking about the skins I bought.

And who made you buy those skins to play?

> [{quoted}](name=MightySaturn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oP157vKJ,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-20T04:09:02.566+0000)
>
> Im definitely talking about the skins I bought.

This guys just cut me off twice and the police didn't stop him. Give me a refund on my vanity plates!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Dediguise,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oP157vKJ,comment-id=00010001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-20T04:14:20.637+0000)
>
> This guys just cut me off twice and the police didn't stop him. Give me a refund on my vanity plates!!!

If you call the police and they dont come to your house then actually yea. Something like this will happen.
Unless you somehow avoid the EULA and ToS it is impossible for you to get a monetary refund.
when does the new season officially get reset?
Yea but it'll be delayed by a day for the most lol.
Time to start saving for Jhin then :D

Meddler, is there going to be a discussion about the new Shen rework soon? I really think communication is key to making reworks less of a "here you go, shoo" kind of deal and more like "hey, what do you think about it?" Not that it would make much of a difference at this point, but something would be nice.
finally going to address any of the numerous problems or still pretending it´s all well?
